paper_abstract: In this article we consider the three-dimensional layout of hypercube networks. Namely, we study the problem of laying hypercube networks out on the three-dimensional grid with the properties that all nodes are represented as rectangular slices and lie on two opposite sides of the bounding box of the layout volume. We present both a lower bound and a layout method, providing an upper bound on the layout volume and the maximum wirelength of the hypercube network. (c) 2005 Wiley Periodicals, Inc.
paper_title: Nearly optimal three dimensional layout of hypercube networks
